name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: This Chicken Caesar Wrap will become your new favorite lunch! It's the perfect balance of flavors and textures wrapped up with a tahini sauce.
ingredients: ▢ ½ teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper
▢ 1 bunch Tuscan kale ribs removed and shredded
▢ 3 tablespoons Everything but the Bagel Seasoning
▢ 2 ripe avocados cut into large wedges
▢ 2 chicken breasts seasoned with salt and pepper and grilled
instructions: Place the olive oil and butter in a small skillet over medium high heat. Add the panko and toast until golden. Season with salt and pepper and set aside.Combine the ingredients for the Tahini Caesar Dressing in a small blender and set aside.Combine the shredded kale and lettuce in a large bowl. Drizzle a few tablespoons of the dressing along with the toasted panko, the everything seasoning and the chopped grilled chicken. Toss to combine. Taste and adjust seasoning and dressing.Place a heading portion into 2 tortillas and wrap and roll. Slice on a diagonal and serve.
